string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Remember there are cameras and microphones in phones, laptops, and tablets
Playing random sound from multiple devices makes it harder to filter out
Leave no record of this conversation
Speak softly: You must be quieter than the static to avoid recording
Plug this device into speakers for louder and more effective jamming
Multiple phones? Put them in a pile and play noise on all of them to amplify effectiveness
Do you have a smart TV? New gaming console? Smart home? They are listening, stand in another room
